question: Can a producer(agents/brokers) enroll customers in a plan with an insurer for which they are not appointed?
text:
Can a producer(agents/brokers) enroll customers in a plan with an insurer for which they are not appointed?
          
        
No. Agents and brokers who are not appointed to a particular insurer cannot write business for that insurer. They should be able to refer a customer to another agent or broker who is appointed with that particular insurer, however.
